parameters.name: Base64Encoded
parameters.description: Specifies whether the data has been encoded in Base64. Valid values: true and false.

parameters.name: CertId
parameters.description: The certificate ID provided by Alibaba Cloud Certificate Management Service.

parameters.name: CertRegionId
parameters.description: The region in which the certificate is stored.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.description:
The data of the Secret. The value must be a JSON array that contains the following information:

*   Key: Secret key
*   Value: Secret value

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the Secret. The name must start with a letter, and can contain digits, letters, and hyphens (-). It can be up to 63 characters in length.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the Kubernetes cluster.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The Secret type. Valid values:

*   Opaque: user-defined data
*   kubernetes.io/tls: Transport Layer Security (TLS) certificate
